name: MedNet Solutions
overview:
MedNet Solutions is a leading eClinical healthcare technology company specializing in electronic data capture (EDC) and clinical study management systems designed for the global life sciences market. Applying critical insight, proven technology and unwavering support, MedNet delivers powerful, flexible and easy-to-use web-based eClinical solutions that support customersâ€™ clinical studies, registries and investigator initiated trials. Since 2000, MedNet has successfully supported leading pharmaceutical, medical device, biotechnology, and clinical research organizations on projects spanning 6 continents and more than 40 countries.

MedNet Solutions’ Products Include:

ENLIGHTENâ„¢ - A full-featured, fully-customizable clinical trial management solution that encompasses easy-to-use electronic data capture (EDC) capabilities, sophisticated data management tools, and complete study management functionality… everything needed for an efficient and successful research initiative.

iMedNetâ„¢ EDC - An innovative, software-as-a-service (SaaS)-based EDC/eClinical technology platform that allows non-technical sponsor and CRO personnel to quickly and easily build and manage their own clinical studies.

EMPOWERâ„¢ - A comprehensive solution that automates the entire Investigator Initiated Trial (IIT) management process for sponsors â€” from initial submissions through presentation planning.

Founded in 2000, MedNet Solutions is a US-based, privately held organization that has quickly grown to be an industry leader. MedNet has extensive experience supporting major sponsor organizations in the pharmaceutical, medical device and biotechnology sectors on globally-deployed clinical study initiatives in all phases and virtually all therapeutic areas.
